purpose: First impression assessment - Communication, motivation, and basic fit

questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
follow_ups: What aspects of your background are most relevant to this role?
How would you summarize your career journey in one sentence?
What's the thread that connects your various experiences?

questions.question: Why are you interested in this role?
follow_ups: What specifically about our company attracted you?
How does this role align with your career goals?
What excites you most about this opportunity?

questions.question: Why did you leave (or are considering leaving) your last job?
follow_ups: What would have made you stay longer?
What did you learn from that experience?
How did that decision lead you here?

questions.question: Why do you think you are the best fit for this role?
follow_ups: What unique skills do you bring that others might not?
How would you describe your working style?
What makes you stand out from other candidates?

questions.question: What would you do if you were assigned a task you've never done before?
follow_ups: Can you give an example of when this happened?
How do you typically approach learning new skills?
Who would you reach out to for help?

questions.question: What is your availability and when could you start?
follow_ups: Do you have any commitments that might affect your start date?
Are you interviewing with other companies currently?

questions.question: What are your salary expectations for this role?
follow_ups: How did you arrive at that number?
Is there flexibility in your expectations?

questions.question: Do you have any questions for me about the role or company?

communication_skills.description: Clarity, conciseness, and confidence in expression

basic_fit.description: Understanding of role, motivation, and availability

judgment.description: Practical thinking, values alignment, and decision-making

scoring_guide.4: Strong - Meets all expectations with some standout moments
scoring_guide.2: Below Average - Some gaps or concerns
scoring_guide.1: Poor - Significant concerns or red flags
